name: It's a Balloon?
description: A fun communication game where players describe objects without mentioning their names.
how_to_play: Each player takes turns describing an object on a card without using certain words while others guess the object.

name: Sonar Family
description: A strategic game where players become submarine captains in a battle of wits.
how_to_play: Teams navigate a submarine while trying to locate and destroy the enemy. The first to achieve their mission wins.

name: Drop It
description: A game of gravity and strategy where players drop pieces into a vertical board.
how_to_play: Players drop different shaped pieces into a board, scoring points based on where they land without breaking placement rules.

name: Match Madness
description: A fast-paced game where players race to match patterns on cards with their blocks.
how_to_play: Players flip a card and race to replicate the pattern using their blocks. The fastest player wins the card.

name: Catapults
description: A children's game where players use a catapult to launch objects into targets.
how_to_play: Players take turns launching objects from a catapult and score points based on where the objects land.

name: Samilo
description: A cooperative game for children where they must work together to achieve a common goal.
how_to_play: Players work together to collect resources and complete objectives before time runs out.

name: Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza
description: A fast-paced card game with a sequence of words that players must match with actions.
how_to_play: Players take turns placing cards in a pile while reciting 'Taco, Cat, Goat, Cheese, Pizza'. When a card matches the word, they must perform the action.

name: Scooby Doo: Escape from the Haunting Mansion
description: An escape room game where players solve mysteries with the Scooby-Doo gang.
how_to_play: Players explore the mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering clues to escape before time runs out.

name: Escape the Dark Castle
description: A cooperative adventure game where players escape from a castle by overcoming challenges.
how_to_play: Players work together to explore rooms, face encounters, and defeat bosses to escape the castle.

name: No Thanks
description: A card game of bidding and bluffing where the goal is to get the fewest points.
how_to_play: Players choose whether to take a card with points or pass it by paying a token. The game ends when all cards are taken.

name: Waterfall Park
description: A game where players build a park by negotiating with each other to gather resources.
how_to_play: Players take turns negotiating deals with other players to collect resources and build the best park.
